title: Who are some of the most intelligent comedians? - Quora

response.answer_text: Here’s the list of the most intelligent living comedians in America ( along with three deceased ones in no particular order): Conan O’Brien: graduated magna cum laude from Harvard.Lisa Kudrow: graduated with a degree in biology from Vasser CollegeBill Cosby: Has a Masters and Doctorate in Education from the University of Massachusetts.Rowan Atkinson: Master’s degree in electrical engineering from University of Oxford. An I.Q. of 170Robin Williams (deceased): according to many critics the foremost comedy genius of all time.Red Skelton (deceased): comedian, composer, painter, short story writer. His paintings sold for millions of dollars. His symphonies were played in Carnegie Hall. He had a near perfect memory and remembered all his lifetime skits, symphony compositions, short stories. He claimed to have a photographic memory.Joan Rivers (deceased): reputed to be one of the best female comedians of all time.And many more.

The late Greg Giraldo had a law degree from Harvard. He also had a drug problem. Jerry Lewis was really smart. I don't know about his education but seemed to have a speedy motor upstairs. Both of Dave Chappelle's parents are/were university professors. Plus, his great-grandfather was this guy: William D. Chappelle - Wikipedia
